column5: Logging Ontario bass  To monitor unexplained declines in Lake Ontario bass populations, the Department of Environmental Conservation will begin a Diary Program at the start of statewide bass season Saturday.  Anglers interested in recording bass caught in Ontario waters this season can enter a name, address and e-mail address at [emailÂ protected].  http://www.buffalonews.com/2010/06/12/1080275/outdoors-notebook-springville.html
Ontario plans on polluting over 15,000 acres of prime LO smallie habitat, It'll be interesting to see how this affects the fish.
